Powershell string check for null or empty

if([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($VERSION)){

        Write-Host "No NSM Version Found"        $installType = 'new install'

}

$VERSION -notmatch "\S"

> $null  -notmatch "\S"
True
> "   "  -notmatch "\S"
True
> " x "  -notmatch "\S"
False
